CLUE: Italian astronomer, a founding father of modern science
FOUND IN: In 1609, Galileo constructed a simple yet powerful refracting telescope, which allowed him to gaze at celestial bodies with unprecedented clarity and detail
Gum arabic: This is a natural gum collected from the Acacia senegal tree, which has been used for various purposes including as an ingredient in pharmaceuticals and cosmetics.
Admiral (highest naval rank, but can be more general)
